settings.heading: How We Test
settings.text: A clinical trial comprised of 34 healthy male & female from the ages of 18-55 applied Laughland‚Äôs whitening formula for 6 and 14 days respectively across 2 weeks.

settings.title: ü¶∑
settings.heading: Clear Results
settings.text: Participants reported an average 74% increase in teeth brightness. This represents 7.2 shades whiter teeth after only 6 days.

settings.title: üëç
settings.heading: 100% Effective
settings.text: 100% of participants reported an increase in teeth whiteness after only 6 treatments and none of the participants reported an increase in sensitivity.

settings.heading: Results To {Smile} About
settings.text: On average, participants saw between 74% and 87% improvement in whiteness after using the Laughland At-Home Kit for 6 and 14 days respectively.

settings.heading: The Numbers {Speak for Themselves}
settings.text: The AD shade guide indicates the lower the score, the whiter the teeth color.

settings.heading: Hydrogen Peroxide
settings.text: Hydrogen peroxide works as a stain remover that penetrates the surface of the tooth enamel and break down the chromogen that cause stains. This oxidization process removes surface stains and discoloration, leading to a brighter and  even appearance of the teeth.

settings.heading: Sodium Bicarbonate
settings.text: Sodium Bicarbonate works as a stain remover and breaks down plaque, surface stains and discoloration in the teeth. Its Alkaline nature neutralizes the acids that can cause tooth enamel erosion which can also cause discoloration.

settings.heading: Glycerin
settings.text: Glycerin creates a protective barrier on the surface of the teeth, prevent staining agents like coffee, tea, and tobacco from adhering to the tooth surface. As a humectant, it helps keep the moisture in the teeth and reduce the amount of abrasion on the teeth, minimizing tooth sensitivity.

settings.heading: Cellulose Gum
settings.text: Cellulose Gum stabilizes and thickens the whitening formula, enhancing the adhesion of the formula to the enamel and accelerating the teeth whitening process.

settings.heading: Sodium Hydroxide
settings.text: Sodium Hydroxide works as a desensitizer that neutralizes the acidity of Hydrogen Peroxide, reducing the acidity of the whitening solution and decreasing chance of tooth sensitivity.

settings.heading: Aloe Vera
settings.text: Aloe leaf juice from the Aloe Vera plant is used as the clear gel base for our teeth whitening solutions due to its inflammatory and soothing properties, which can reduce tooth sensitivity and reduce microbes.

settings.heading: Mint Extract
settings.text: Mint extract is added to our whitening formula to create a refreshing taste
